QuestData.Title: Missing Persons
QuestData.Description: Our new friend brings us some disturbing information.$b$bShe claims to have seen a large number of citizens dragged from Starcaller Retreat in chains. Their destination appears to be Astravar Harbor.$b$bThose taken to the harbor have yet to return, however. Worse yet, the area is now overrun with demons.$b$bI need you to find out where these people went. Infiltrate the harbor and gather any information you can.$b$bStart with the Legion filth- their corpses may point us in the right direction.
QuestData.LogDescription: Acquire a Legion Communicator from demons in Astravar Harbor.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you learned where the captives have been taken?
